name: TarsEscape
description:
This game is a fan-made game for the robot Tars in the movie Interstellar. The robot is looking for the chips that humans need in the abandoned station on some random planet. You will win the game if you find all the chips in the game, or you will die because of the outage of the long-used battery.

(and there are two pictures and a video on the itch.io, so it satisfies all the requirements in the video.)
